core_concept: Quantum entanglement is a special way that tiny particles can connect with each other, even if they are really far apart. It's like they have a secret language that lets them talk to each other instantly, no matter what.

key_actors_and_components.name: Photons
key_actors_and_components.description: Tiny particles of light that help show how entanglement works.

key_actors_and_components.name: Entangled Particles
key_actors_and_components.description: Tiny particles that are connected in a special way, even when they're far apart.

key_actors_and_components.name: Superposition
key_actors_and_components.description: A state where something can be two things at the same time, like being both 'up' and 'down'.

key_actors_and_components.name: Quantum States
key_actors_and_components.description: The different ways that particles can behave in a quantum world.

story_of_process.name: Connection
story_of_process.description: Two or more tiny particles become connected, or 'entangled', so they can talk to each other instantly.

story_of_process.name: Superposition
story_of_process.description: The entangled particles get into a state where they can be two things at the same time. For example, one particle might be spinning clockwise and counterclockwise at the same time!

story_of_process.name: Measurement
story_of_process.description: When someone observes or 'measures' one of the entangled particles, it instantly affects the other particle, no matter how far apart they are.

story_of_process.name: Entanglement Breaks Down
story_of_process.description: As time goes on and the particles get farther apart, their connection starts to break down, making it harder for them to stay entangled.

core_principles.name: Quantum Non-Locality
core_principles.description: The idea that something can be connected and affected by another thing, even when they're really far apart.

core_principles.name: Wave-Particle Duality
core_principles.description: The ability of tiny particles to behave like both waves and particles at the same time.
